name: SnowBallanche
description:
SnowBallanche is a fun arcade game that you can play whenever you want to.
The first few runs might lag but it gets smoother along the way. Well, at least that's what happens in my case.

Controls (PC):
A, D for moving left and right.
Spacebar for jumping.

Controls (Android):
Use the arrow buttons to move to the desired direction.
Tap anywhere on the screen without a button to jump.

Tips:
Jumping decreases your rolling speed.
Fire can melt your snowball so beware of it.
Fire can also slow you down but being melted too much will cause your snowball to melt completely.

Credits to Colin Brown for his awesome UI pack, get them here:
https://colinbrown.itch.io/hand-drawn-icons
